content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.zinin-icar-arts'> <front> <title>Area Review Teams for Early Cross-functional Reviews</title>  <author initials='A' surname='Zinin' fullname='Alex Zinin'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='March' day='15' year='2004' />  <abstract><t>This document contains a proposal for cross-functional IETF review process that can be initiated at early stages of a document life cycle. The approach is based on existing experience with area directorates and other expert groups within the IETF.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-zinin-icar-arts-00' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-zinin-icar-arts-00.txt' /> </reference>
